title: How to Make Pueblo Feast Day Cookies

steps.headline: Combine dry ingredients except sugar and the nuts.
In another bowl cream the lard and sugar.
Add the dry ingredients to the lard mixture.
Slowly add enough water to make a soft dough.
steps.description: The dough should not be sticky.

steps.headline: Cut out cookies in desired shapes.

text: Preheat oven to 375 °F (191 °C).  Combine dry ingredients except sugar and the nuts.  In another bowl cream the lard and sugar.  Add the dry ingredients to the lard mixture.  Slowly add enough water to make a soft dough. The dough should not be sticky. Add the nuts.  Roll out dough 1/2-inch thick.  Cut out cookies in desired shapes.  Dip in cinnamon-sugar mixture.  Bake until crisp.  Finished.
